scripts.build-dev:binary-clock: ng build binary-clock && ng lint binary-clock
scripts.build-dev:googlemaps: ng build googlemaps && ng lint googlemaps
scripts.build-dev:learning: ng build learning && ng lint learning
scripts.build-dev:memory: ng build memory & ng lint memory
scripts.build-dev:money-spin: ng build money-spin && ng lint money-spin
scripts.build-dev:weekend-countdown: ng build weekend-countdown && ng lint weekend-countdown
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev:binary-clock && npm run build-dev:googlemaps && npm run build-dev:learning && npm run build-dev:memory && npm run build-dev:money-spin && npm run build-dev:weekend-countdown
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod:binary-clock && npm run build-prod:googlemaps && npm run build-prod:learning && npm run build-prod:memory && npm run build-prod:money-spin && npm run build-prod:weekend-countdown
